website_summaries.verdict: Six layers of protection from UV, rain, wind, dirt, and dust, yet the inner cotton layer won’t scratch.
pros: This is a universal-size truck cover that will fit any truck up to 20.5 feet
Adjustable buckles and straps keep it in place in wind
Use it to protect your truck in all seasons
cons: Some complaints about zipper jams and breaks

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings on this product
customer_reviews.text: It has torn pretty easily after sitting in the sun just from wind? I'm not sure what caused it to rip. I like the way it has clips To hold it on the car. No need for strings or hooks. Mixed feelings on this product. I may try it again.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this cover for Tacoma’s
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a few times right before a monsoon storm hit the valley of the sun and I was able to get it on in a hurry and tied down to weather the storm. No leaks and kept my newly washed truck clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Brendan P. O'connor

customer_reviews.title: This was a surprise how good it fit
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised, at how nice this cover was, lightweight and easy to put on. Silver color is light repelling and the zipper is good for easy access. We used this on my Bmw 325 I that sits in the sun and is not our daily driver works great would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Protects against weather, fits well, mostly survived high winds
customer_reviews.text: I used this cover for nearly 5 months with no issues until we had some 50 mph winds. The cover remained intact except for tear at the middle strap seam. It fit my new Ram 1500 well, and never leaked even through the rainiest of weather. The tear is not surprising given the strain a 50 mph wind would place on the straps. TONBUX promptly replaced the cover under warranty at no cost. Very satisfied and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: andhum

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Easy
customer_reviews.text: It did well for a while. I left for deployment for 7 months and it was fine. This time I left for two weeks and came back and it was ripped all the way down the middle. Not the best quality I guess. The reflection does well for keeping the sun off the vehicle though. Didn’t have a chance to test it in other weather because I’m in Southern California. It’s kind of upsetting that it didn’t even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality but...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but got completely destroyed by the wind. Cover was ripped from one end to the other front to back. Securing straps were not strong enough and came loose.
customer_reviews.author: coconut cliff

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This car cover is protecting my car from bird feces and everything else. I love that it has the side zipper on it. It stayed on while it's been quiet windy but I still don't know if it will stay on when it gets really windy and the gust is 20+. Overall I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Reishi

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. First one the high winds shredded it up. Too bad they don't make one too withstand the CA High Winds.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to fit my 2005 Chevy 2500 crew cab (It doesn’t it’s way to small barely goes halfway over the wheel ) so tight it it looks like it was shrink wrapped ☹️Poor fit!
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR SON IN LAWS NEW TRUCK AND IT FITS PERFECT AND IT IS AS ADVERTISED THANKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: 2020 F150 s cab no fit!
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit a F150 super crew . Fits front well but narrows at rear and doesn't fit well at rear window.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Rider

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fit a 2011 Dodge Ram Laramie edition with no problems. Only thing I would recommend is a tag saying "Front" and "Back. Luckily I got it right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Broken buckle and Torn in less than a day
customer_reviews.text: The first day installing this the middle buckle broke without even pulling it that tight, then the second day having a little wind blowing caused the seem where the strap is stiched to the cover tear across this thing sucks it's really cheaply built and definitely not worth 100$
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Cover Your Car
customer_reviews.text: Great car cover! Well made and easy to use! Price is right! Quick on time delivery!
customer_reviews.author: MPMC

customer_reviews.title: Higher price for low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not tight enough wind gets under it and flips it off the vehicle, straps broken from high winds....didn’t even last me a full winter In S.W. Michigan...
customer_reviews.author: Levi Exposito

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid and strong. Covered my subi perfectly. One issue is hard to fold it back. LoL.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: The most important to know is that i can get it on amazon!!!😊👍🤙
customer_reviews.text: 😃Very Happy with this item,i did use it on my 2019 F-150 Super-Crue,i will definitely buy again.😊👍🍹🍾🎻🎺🎸🎷
customer_reviews.author: Monje

customer_reviews.title: Good cover but not fully waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Covers truck well but water gets in through the seams, so not truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Carmody

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a Chevy Silverado truck. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: very lite weight material
customer_reviews.text: very lite weight material. Didn't look like it would withstand very strong winds. just had one made from same material come apart in strong wind. Tore at the bottom seam. Looks to be waterproof but didn't try it on truck. Returned
customer_reviews.author: tom lamb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover back in May 2020 and it tore in 2 places when I try and take it off! It only lasted 4 months??? I don’t recommend this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gray Ankle Booties

customer_reviews.title: Snug fitting
customer_reviews.text: Love it wish it was 21 ft, snug fit for our mega cab
customer_reviews.author: Jo Hanners

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Covered a seldom used truck, great product IF you are not going to take cover on and off frequently
customer_reviews.author: Taxman 2019

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Still using to cover the 1994 f-140 502. Great cover
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hardison

customer_reviews.title: It fits well
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my car perfectly and very easy to use. I bought this to prevent my car directly occupant from sun, it doesn’t frustrate me, cause it protects my car to some extent. In the meanwhile, it always keep my car cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Also, price can not compare with others. Love it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: H. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Became brittle and ripped in less than 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is cover in late August and it’s dry rotted already. Rips easily. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R

customer_reviews.title: Protection  you want and need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on SUV, and to take off, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good for winter and summer time. Also on windy days! I bought it for my 2001 Celica and a 2011 Camry fits like a glove on both cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looks great!
customer_reviews.text: it fits nice, with exception with the antenna... had to make a hole :/
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lamadrid

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, easy to install and remove. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper.  Better off without it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the straps that hold the cover down. But the zippers are very poor quality. When I zipped it together, one zipper jumped the track. No way to reattach it. No zipper starting pin. I’m gonna send this one back.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Tie down is different than others, having to go around bottom. Gets dirty quick
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is waterproof but hate the strapping system. Why a strap in the middle? To crawl under you truck to hook it up?
customer_reviews.author: J M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well sort of a pain totakeoffand put back on, but this was expected
customer_reviews.author: Caryl Kuykendall

product_meta.title: TONBUX Truck Cover 6 Layers - Waterproof All Weather Car Covers with Cotton Protection for Auto Vehicle Indoor Outdoor for Pickup Truck Fits up to 246''
feature_bullets: ✔【Premium Material】: Made of 6 layers high-density and breathable materials, Protective coating+PE+Aluminium film+PE+EVA+Cotton, PE&EVA is 100% waterproof and dustproof, aluminium foil is sunproof and anti-UV, cotton protect vehicle paint. Much more durable than most similar products out there

✔【All Weather Protection】: All weather truck car covers can effectively protect your vehicle from harmful UV rays, dirt, dust, snow, frost, industrial pollutants and bird droppings. Its soft cotton lining protect your car from scratch, perfect for indoor and outdoor use

✔【Anti-strong Wind Design】: Adjustable straps and buckles at the bottom to protect your truck cover from blowing off in windy days. Elastic hem at the bottom to keep the cover securely on your truck. Double stitched seams for adding durability

✔【20.5'Universal Fit】: TONBUX truck cover will fit almost all the trucks up to 20.5'long (Dimensions: 20.5'L x 6.6'W x 5.7'H). "Inverted-V"design makes this cover a universal fit! Please send your truck model to before purchasing and We will help you to confirm the cover is suitable for your truck

✔【What You Get】 - A set of TONBUX professional car cover. We offer a FREE REPLACEMENT POLICY and 1-YEARS MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. And every car cover we ships out undergoes strict quality checks, totally no worries for you
